alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 3:19PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...SMOKE FROM DISTANT CANADIAN WILDFIRES WILL IMPACT THE AREA... Surface observations and satellite images indicate that smoke being generated from wildfires in Canada continues to impact the area. Visibilities will generally range from 2 to 5 miles into this evening resulting in pockets of poor air quality across parts of Southeast Georgia and far southern South Carolina. This includes the Savannah Metro Area. The smoke is expected to persist into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Active children and adults as well as those with respiratory ailments that can be triggered by smoke should severely limit outdoor activity and stay indoors.

area.areaDesc: Beaufort; Coastal Colleton; Coastal Jasper; Inland Jasper
